channel.title: Odd error, with command specific names (just read)
channel.description:
-=[u][b]PLEASE HELP ME![/b][/u]=-
[hr]
ok so on my server
the admins and some co's were abusing alot of the give(staff) and ipban commands
so i tried to make it just the 4 people i know and trust: me, my brother, my irl friend, and my fav co owner.
heres the an example of the code i tried (i made it from pieces of other things i found)
[code] } else if (command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerName.equals("loufeiscool") || (playerName.equals("ass") || (playerName.equals("drake")))) {[/code] changed to a different one sorry. because the giveadmin one works i think. could it be because giveadmin is [code] if[/code] and the others are [code] else if[/code] ? [u][b]AND It IS NOT ABOUt HOW MANY BRACKETS AT THE END- I ASSURE YOU - SO DOES JAVAC[/b][/u]
what the problem is [b]-loufeiscool, the first character all commands work fine and everything is good -ass,drake,joshy cannot teleport (teletab) it just resets the client. -ass,drake,joshy automatically use some of the commands, ::alltome is the only command that doesnt need other input. so occaisonaly everyone is teleported to them, which makes people unhappy.[/b]
if someone could either [b]-point out the problem -give me a fixed version -suggest something[/b]
i would really appreciate if you could show me whats wrong too :)
thanks, k1ngy.

item.title: Odd error, with command specific names (just read)
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("giveowner") && playerName.equals("loufeiscool") || playerName.equals("ass") || playerName.equals("drake") || playerName.equals("joshy")) {

K.

Read full topic

item.title: Odd error, with command specific names (just read)
item.dc:creator: @k1ngy k1ngy
item.description:
@k1ngy wrote:

-=PLEASE HELP ME!=-

[hr]

ok so on my server

the admins and some co’s were abusing alot of the give(staff) and ipban commands

so i tried to make it just the 4 people i know and trust: me, my brother, my irl friend, and my fav co owner.

heres the an example of the code i tried (i made it from pieces of other things i found)

} else if (command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerName.equals("loufeiscool") || (playerName.equals("ass") || (playerName.equals("drake")))) {
changed to a different one sorry. because the giveadmin one works i think.
could it be because giveadmin is

          if

and the others are

          else if

?
AND It IS NOT ABOUt HOW MANY BRACKETS AT THE END- I ASSURE YOU - SO DOES JAVAC

what the problem is
-loufeiscool, the first character all commands work fine and everything is good
-ass,drake,joshy cannot teleport (teletab) it just resets the client.
-ass,drake,joshy automatically use some of the commands, ::alltome is the only command that doesnt need other input. so occaisonaly everyone is teleported to them, which makes people unhappy.

if someone could either
-point out the problem
-give me a fixed version
-suggest something

i would really appreciate if you could show me whats wrong too

thanks, k1ngy.
